description:
Learn the key steps to making your first 100 days as a leader a success.

80% new CEO's are unprepared for taking on their new appointed role. Higher in other leadership roles. Make sure you are prepared

"There are about 350 new CEOs at the world's largest public companies right now... And Booz's data shows that almost 90% of the new CEOs have never held this position before." Forbes

What do you need to do, what to watch out for and ways to make sure you are the most effective leader in your organisation. If you are new to the company or just been promoted into a new role, these skills will help make sure this transition is rewarding for all involved.

If your looking to move into a leadership role in a new organisation, job hunting or aiming for a promotion the tips and techniques you will learn may help you score that job. Being prepared is key and by doing this course you are preparing yourself for leadership success.


There is a 30Day Money Back Guarantee, so no risk in enrolling today, but if you don't enrol you may just find yourself struggling in your next readership role.
title: First 100 Days as a Leader, do it right, make an impact
